root.name: Stack Rotation by Angle
root.description:
The plugin rotates each 2D image of the stack with a preset angle. The angle can be set for each 2D plane: XY, XZ,YZ.
crop option - extracts a 3D stack from the output to fit the input stack.
the interpolation method is the bilinear interpolation.
root.author: spop - Sorin Pop
root.changelog:
